item.title: 震撼金融市场的十个交易日
item.description: 竹内顺太郎说，这种痛苦是十分的。【原文：The pain, said Shuntaro Takeuchi, was 10 out of 10.】

item.title: 瑞士银行游说团加强对瑞银迁址风险的警告
item.description: 瑞士主要的银行业游说团体周五表示，如果瑞银被赶走，瑞士经济可能面临严重后果，并加强了对该银行面临过度监管风险的警告。【原文：Switzerland's main banking lobby on Friday said the Swiss economy could face serious consequences if UBS were driven away, intensifying warnings about the risks of hitting the bank with excessive regulations.】

item.title: 美国芯片制造商外包生产将逃避中国关税
item.description: 根据中国主要半导体协会周五发布的通知，外包生产的美国芯片制造商将免受中国对美国进口产品征收报复性关税的影响。【原文：U.S. chipmakers which outsource manufacturing will be exempt from China's retaliatory tariffs on U.S. imports, according to a notice by the main Chinese semiconductor association on Friday.】

item.title: 痛苦的一周过后，投资者处于高度焦虑状态
item.description: 数万亿美元的市场价格被抹去，又被重新纳入投资组合，这导致投资者高度焦虑，一些人在等待特朗普政府的关税政策如何变化的同时，也采取了降低风险头寸的举措。【原文：Trillions of dollars in market prices alternately have been wiped off and added back to portfolios, leading to high anxiety among investors and a move by some to dial down risky positions as they wait to see how the Trump administration's policy on tariffs shakes out.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中美贸易战升级，中国交易所限制每日股票销售
item.description: 周五，四位消息人士称，中国股市已对对冲基金和大型散户投资者的股票净卖出设置了每日限制，因为在与美国的贸易战愈演愈烈之际，中国政府正在加大对股市的支持力度。【原文：Chinese bourses have set daily restrictions on net share sales by hedge funds and large retail investors, four sources said on Friday, as Beijing steps up support for its stock markets in an intensifying trade war with the United States.】

item.title: 贝莱德季度利润因成本增加而下降
item.description: 周五，贝莱德公布第一季度利润下降，原因是全球最大的资产管理公司因支出增加而受到冲击。【原文：BlackRock posted a drop in first-quarter profit on Friday as the world's largest asset manager took a hit from higher expenses.】

item.title: 欧佩克增产和贸易战让美国石油生产商对 "钻宝宝 "保持警惕
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统上任第一天就提出要增加美国的石油和天然气产量，但实际上，由于欧佩克原油产量增加和时好时坏的关税抑制了需求，美国的石油行业已经开始考虑削减产量和工作岗位。【原文：President Donald Trump moved on his first day in office to increase U.S. oil and gas production, but the country's oil industry is actually starting to think about cutting output and jobs due to a double whammy of higher crude output from OPEC and on-again, off-again tariffs that have dented demand.】

item.title: 市场困境可能导致数万亿美元资产寻求货币保护
item.description: 随着唐纳德-特朗普重新定义全球贸易的宏伟计划对美元造成冲击，持有价值数万亿美元货币资产的投资者可能会在数十年来首次寻求保护这些资产价值的方法。【原文：As Donald Trump's grand plan to redefine global trade whipsaws the U.S. dollar, investors who hold tens of trillions' worth assets in the currency may for the first time in decades be seeking ways to protect the value of those holdings.】

item.title: 中国大幅加征关税，美股期货下跌
item.description: 美国股指期货周五下跌，此前中国将对美国进口商品征收的关税提高至125%，贸易战升级，可能扰乱全球贸易并引发经济衰退。【原文：U.S. stock index futures fell on Friday after China increased its tariffs on U.S. imports to 125%, escalating a trade war that could disrupt global trade and trigger an economic downturn.】

item.title: 中国电子产品公司 Anker 开始在亚马逊上提价
item.description: 中国的Anker公司是亚马逊最大的销售商之一，提供从电源箱到手机壳等产品，自周四以来，该公司在美国平台上五分之一的产品提高了价格，这表明对中国商品征收的关税正在转嫁给美国购物者。【原文：China's Anker, one of Amazon's largest sellers offering products from power banks to phone cases, has raised prices on a fifth of its products on the U.S. platform since Thursday, in a sign that tariffs on Chinese goods are being passed on to U.S. shoppers.】

item.title: 俄罗斯律师称花旗银行在俄客户收到部分被冻结资金
item.description: 据俄罗斯律师事务所援引其客户的话称，美国花旗银行俄罗斯子公司的经纪客户已开始收到因西方制裁而在欧洲被冻结的证券的息票付款。【原文：Brokerage customers of the Russian subsidiary of U.S. bank Citi have started receiving coupon payments on securities frozen in Europe by Western sanctions, according to Russian law firms, citing their clients.】

item.title: 世贸组织前任和现任领导人要求迅速改革，以保持全球自由贸易的活力
item.description: 世界贸易组织的一位前负责人表示，受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面保护主义关税影响，未来的全球贸易条件可能会在这个已有 30 年历史的国际监督机构之外决定，除非它迅速进行自我改革。【原文：A former World Trade Organization boss has said the future terms of global trade, rocked by U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping protectionist tariffs, could be decided outside the 30-year-old international watchdog unless it reforms itself fast.】

item.title: 外国投资者一周内抛售 65 亿美元美国股票
item.description: 博雅全球研究公司（BofA Global Research）周五称，由于关税引发的市场动荡，外国投资者在截至周三的五个交易日内抛售了65亿美元的美国股票。【原文：Foreign investors dumped $6.5 billion of U.S. equities in the five trading sessions ending Wednesday, BofA Global Research said on Friday, as tariff induced turmoil gripped markets.】

item.title: 中国回击特朗普加征关税，将美国商品关税提高至 125
item.description: 北京周五将美国进口商品的关税提高至125%，以回击美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将中国商品关税提高至145%的决定，从而提高了贸易战的赌注，这场贸易战有可能终结全球供应链。【原文：Beijing on Friday increased its tariffs on U.S. imports to 125%, hitting back against U.S. President Donald Trump's decision to hike duties on Chinese goods to 145%, raising the stakes in a trade war that threatens to up-end global supply chains.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发贸易动荡，强势美元倍感压力
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对朋友和敌人征收混乱的关税，破坏了数十年来人们对世界储备货币的信任，美元在短短一周内从避风港变成了投资者的鞭打对象。【原文：In just a week, the dollar has gone from a safe haven to investors' whipping boy as U.S. President Donald Trump's chaotic tariffs on friend and foe alike undermine decades of trust in the world's reserve currency.】

item.title: 倍耐力表示没有在美国投资的计划
item.description: 倍耐力轮胎制造商周五表示，目前没有计划在美国投资，这与一家意大利报纸的报道相矛盾。【原文：Pirelli is not planning investments in the United States at the moment, the tyre maker said on Friday, contradicting a report in an Italian newspaper.】

item.title: 台湾 Vanguard 加快新加坡晶圆厂的建设步伐
item.description: 台湾芯片制造商万古国际半导体（Vanguard International Semiconductor）周五表示，由于地缘政治风险，该公司将加快其位于新加坡的12英寸晶圆厂的建设速度，因为客户正在寻求更多在中国以外生产芯片的选择。【原文：Taiwan chip maker Vanguard International Semiconductor said on Friday it will speed construction of its 12-inch fab in Singapore because of geopolitical risks, as customers seek more options to make chips outside China.】

item.title: 摩根大通分析师表示，他现在会缓和对美国关税的公开评论
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）的一位资深投资策略师表示，由于担心自己的全部观点会对同事和华尔街银行造成影响，他对美国关税问题的一些公开评论有所保留。【原文：A senior JPMorgan Asset Management investment strategist said he has held back on some of his public comments on U.S. tariffs due to concerns about the impact his full opinions would have on his colleagues and on the Wall Street bank.】

item.title: Lucid 收购位于亚利桑那州的部分尼古拉设施和资产
item.description: 总部位于加利福尼亚州的 Lucid 集团周五表示，将收购亚利桑那州的部分设施和资产，这些设施和资产以前属于破产的电动和氢动力卡车制造商尼古拉公司（Nikola Corp .【原文：California-based Lucid Group on Friday said it will acquire select Arizona-based facilities and assets previously belonging to bankrupt electric and hydrogen-powered truckmaker Nikola Corp .】

item.title: 大众汽车旗下斯堪尼亚收购破产的 Northvolt 重工业电池组部门
item.description: 大众汽车旗下卡车制造商斯堪尼亚（Scania）周五表示，已同意收购破产的 Northvolt 公司为重工业生产电池组的部门，重启了 2 月份首次提出的交易，具体价格未透露。【原文：Volkswagen's truckmaker Scania said on Friday it had agreed to buy bankrupt Northvolt's division that makes battery packs for heavy industry, reviving a transaction first presented in February, for an undisclosed price.】

item.title: 瑞典海克斯康公司称北美和中国经济增长乏力影响第一季度盈利
item.description: 瑞典工业技术集团海克斯康（Hexagon）周五表示，由于北美和中国的增长逊于预期，该公司第一季度调整后营业利润下降了约 8%，股价下跌了 6%。【原文：Swedish industrial technology group Hexagon said on Friday its adjusted operating profit fell around 8% in the first quarter due to weaker than expected growth in North America and China, sending its shares 6% lower.】

item.title: 中国 3 月出口可能在特朗普新关税生效前获得前置性提升
item.description: 尽管与美国不断扩大的贸易战令经济前景暗淡，但由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）本月将全面征收关税，中国的工厂赶在关税之前发货，因此 3 月份中国的出口可能加快了步伐。【原文：China's exports likely picked up pace in March, as factories rushed out shipments ahead of U.S. President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs this month, though the broadening trade war with the United States has darkened the economic outlook.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，申银万国伦敦上市获英国批准，正等待中国点头
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，在线快速时尚零售商 Shein 已获得英国金融行为监管局（FCA）的批准，计划在伦敦进行首次公开募股。【原文：Online fast-fashion retailer Shein has secured approval from Britain's Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) for its planned initial public offering in London, according to two sources with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Stellantis 第一季度出货量同比下降 9
item.description: Stellantis 周五表示，其第一季度的出货量与去年同期相比下降了 9%，估计为 120 万辆。【原文：Stellantis said on Friday its first-quarter shipments were down 9% compared to last year, to an estimated 1.2 million vehicles.】

item.title: 独家报道虚假账户为杜特尔特点赞，现在又瞄准菲律宾大选
item.description: 菲律宾前总统罗德里戈-杜特尔特（Rodrigo Duterte）因血腥的毒品战争被送往国际刑事法院接受指控后，一个复杂的虚假社交媒体账户网络慷慨激昂地为他辩护。【原文：A sophisticated network of fake social media accounts sprang to the impassioned defence of former Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte after he was sent to the International Criminal Court to face charges over his bloody drug war.】

item.title: 法国总统马克龙：特朗普暂停加征关税只是 "脆弱的暂停
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）周五表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）本周决定暂停对各国征收关税90天，这只为 "脆弱的暂停 "提供了空间。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron said on Friday that U.S. President Donald Trump's decision this week for a 90-day suspension on tariffs he had imposed on countries gave room for only a 'fragile pause'.】

item.title: 市场持续波动，投资者正努力应对关税带来的经济威胁
item.description: 周四，希望结束市场剧烈波动的投资者意识到，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普不断变化的关税计划所带来的后果仍对盈利和经济构成威胁，并可能对股市造成更多惩罚。【原文：Investors hoping for an end to wild market swings were reminded on Thursday that fallout from U.S. President Donald Trump's shifting tariff plans remains a threat to earnings and the economy, and could deal yet more punishment to equities.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税混乱可能导致飞机交付陷入困境
item.description: 在过去几个月里，由于白宫时好时坏的关税政策，汽车、消费品和工业设备时常在港口延误、滞留在铁路车辆上、在仓库里徘徊。【原文：Cars, consumer goods, and industrial equipment have been delayed at ports, stuck on rail cars, and languished in warehouses at times over the last few months due to the White House's on-again, off-again tariff policy.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，谷歌在安卓和 Pixel 集团裁员数百人
item.description: 据 The Information 周五援引一位知情人士的话报道，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌周四裁掉了平台和设备部门的数百名员工，该部门主要负责安卓软件、Pixel 手机和 Chrome 浏览器。【原文：Alphabet's Google on Thursday laid off hundreds of employees in its platforms and devices unit, which works on Android software, Pixel phones and the Chrome browser, The Information reported on Friday, citing a person with direct knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场重回白刃战
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】
